refnamediv.refpurpose: Removes child from list of children

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.description;
DOMNode
DOMNode removeChild DOMNodeoldnode
This functions removes a child from a list of children.
Throws DOMException if the node cannot be removed.

&reftitle.returnvalues;
If the child could be removed the functions returns the old child.
